attributes.action: STOP Alternative Policing is happening in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This report was given in an interiew by the Chied of Constabulary to the Times Newspaper
attributes.background: Chief Inspector of Constabulary. Reports that "Alternative " policing is being administered in some parts of Britian. They administer justice even in case of murder and sexual assaults on Children. Police are NEVER called to certain minority communities as they administer their own Justice.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
